titleStmt.title: A declaration to the free-born people of England now in arms against the tyrannie and oppression of Oliver Cromwell esq.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "march. 16. 1654"; "[Last night this libell was scatered up and down the streets."].
Thomason copy imperfect; bottom edge torn.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
